name: futuristically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is strange and very modern, or seeming to come from an imagined time in the future: This stylish hotel is futuristically designed in steel and glass. The five-door version of the new model is futuristically stylish.
More examplesFewer examplesThis exciting new racing boat is futuristically styled, both on deck and below.Except for the wind turbine spinning futuristically on a hill, we could have been in Victorian England.The stadium remains as futuristically fresh as when it was first built.
